name: Get up
description:
This game involves sensitive topics like anxiety, depression, etc. So if you are sensitive to such material, please do not play this game.

"Get up" is more of an interactive story than a game. It's full of hidden meanings and metaphors.

It is my first game and I am no professional writer so I know the script could be better but I really wanted to make this game and tell this story.

Web player:

https://itch.io/embed-upload/571387?color=333333
